company_profile: Acme MedTech is a mid-cap medical devices company focused on minimally invasive surgical tools and monitoring equipment. It generates roughly 60% of revenue in the US, 25% in Europe, and 15% in Asia, with a high mix of recurring disposable instrument and service revenue.
recent_events: Reported Q2 revenue +11% YoY with 150 bps gross margin expansion, driven by a new surgical platform launch.
Guidance raised for the full year by 3% on stronger US procedure volumes.
Announced a small tuck-in acquisition of an AI-enabled imaging software company.
Hospital procurement data shows modest pricing pressure from a large competitor in Europe.
